effect_entries.effect: This Pokémon does not take damage from friendly Pokémon's moves, including single-target moves aimed at it.
effect_entries.short_effect: Protects against friendly Pokémon's damaging moves.

effect_entries.effect: Affects other Pokémon with this ability.

While this Pokémon is in battle, opposing Pokémon cannot flee or switch out.

Other Pokémon with this ability are unaffected.  Pokémon with run away can still flee.  Pokémon can still switch out with the use of a move or item.
effect_entries.short_effect: Prevents opponents from fleeing or switching out.
